com.erkanerol.core

Class DistributedHashTableManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erkanerol.core.DistributedHashTableManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableEventHandler, TableEventListener

    public class DistributedHashTableManager
extends Object
implements TableEventListener, TableEventHandler
    an organizer class for managing multiple distributed hash table with same network components.
    Author:
    Erkan Erol

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistributedHashTableManager(Config config)
      creates a network manager and creates an empty map for all tables

      • getDistributedHashTable

        public <K,V> DistributedHashTable<K,V> getDistributedHashTable(String tableName)
        returns the table related to given name. if there is no table related to given table name, creates a new one and returns it
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table
        Returns:
        the table related to given table name
